subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gar Forman has been promoted to general manager of the Chicago Bulls, replacing John Paxson, who will remain with the team as executive vice president for basketball operations. Forman has been director of player personnel the last five years.
snippet: Gar Forman has been promoted to general manager of the Chicago Bulls, replacing John Paxson, who will remain with the team as executive vice president for basketball operations. Forman has been director of player personnel the last five years.
